Package me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.delivery

Interface Summary
Authentication  
DeliveryRecipientStatus Status for the delivery of an email to a recipient
SMTPDeliveryAgentConfig Configuration which is used to deliver email via SMTP
SMTPDeliveryEnvelope A SMTPDeliveryEnvelope is a complete transaction which is used to deliver an email per SMTP.
SMTPDeliverySessionConstants Constants for temporary data which will get stored in the SMTPClientSession.getAttributes() while sending the message
 

Class Summary
LMTPDeliveryAgent SMTPDeliveryAgent which use the wrapped SMTPClientTransport to deliver email via LMTP
SMTPDeliveryAgent SMTPDeliveryAgent which use the wrapped SMTPClientTransport to deliver email via SMTP
 

Enum Summary
Authentication.AuthMode  
DeliveryRecipientStatus.DeliveryStatus  
SMTPDeliveryAgentConfig.PipeliningMode
